benchmark_details.name: Are You Human? An Adversarial Benchmark to Expose LLMs
benchmark_details.overview: This paper presents a new benchmark dataset designed to evaluate text-based prompts that expose large language models (LLMs) in real-time interactions. It includes implicit and explicit challenges for detecting LLM impostors.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To empower users to identify AI agents in real-time conversations using a framework of challenges.

data.source: Open-source benchmark dataset compiled from various sources including academic literature and online platforms.

methodology.calculation: Detection rates are calculated based on the successful identification of LLMs using explicit and implicit challenges.
methodology.interpretation: Higher success rates indicate the effectiveness of the challenges in detecting AI impostors.
methodology.baseline_results: Explicit challenges showed a detection rate of 78.4% compared to 22.9% for implicit challenges.
methodology.validation: User studies confirmed the real-world applicability of proposed methods.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Informed consent was obtained from participants in user studies.
